page.title: 13Farming in Rhos
page.content: The main type of farming is dairy farming,but other types of agriculture are also carried out.For example,hay is grown by several farmers for winter feed;winter barley is also grown from which dairy cake is produced;potatoes are also grown for sale in local markets;chickens are kept by many farmers for free range eggs;and pigs are kept for meat production. Dairy farming is the most important type of agricultural activity.The dairy farmer generally starts work at 6.30 a.m. and finishes about 6.30 p.m. In one farm in this area,Edisbury Grange,there are 160 cows kept for milk production,25 cows that are in calf at the moment and 2 bulls.Each cow is milked twice a day by an automatic milking machine.The milk is then cooled and left in a bulk storage tank to await collection by road
